author: bnicholes
msg: Added a clean up on exit routine to try to make sure that the ApacheC nlm
on NetWare is exited gracefully even on an abnormal shutdown.  This fixes
the Ouch! out of memory problem when trying to restart Apache for NetWare

author: bnicholes
msg: Added a check to make sure that Apache is starting in a clean
environment.  This protects against ill behaved modules that exit the web
server rudely leaving ApacheC.nlm in an unknown state.

author: wrowe
msg: Thanks for the reminder, martin, so are netware and os/2

author: orlikowski
msg: Change strtok() calls to use apr_strtok().

author: martin
msg: And Win32 is there too, of course.
